channel.title: Fishes
channel.description: Well how come the prices are messed up now? I remeber when a raw monk fish was 300 and a cooked sold for 350-360 now a raw sells for 390 or mid 420 and a cooked at max is 330? Whats the point of cooking them other than exp. Same with lobs and other foods

item.title: Fishes
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Cowie`:

Fishing is almost as bad as Crafting, although probably still the best method of money besides slaying / clues it is getting pretty fucked up, in the past week Nat prices went down to 266ea @ G.E, and Ess went to 144gp. I’m not sure of the current figures but to be perfectly honest since G.E Came out the economy has stabilized, but the prices are still fucked up.

That is because if some rich dude irl went out and bought 5 accounts with 2b each on it, he could set any item to any price he wanted (via buying them and high alching them, raising the price). They only thing he couldnt do is lower the price. Basically my point is, items change depending on how much of them are sold and boughten each day. Jagex did a good job making the only economical stabilizer in runescape based upon supply and demand.

Read full topic

item.title: Fishes
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

I’ve never been there but most of the videos I’ve watched it looks pretty good. It sicks that you get a target but I think you might not be able to but you can kill people that arn’t your Target, you get a 180 penalty for killing someone who’s not your target and if your really unlucky you could have up to 4 people attacking you, your target, the person who has to kill you and two other random people…

EDIT - Its single way now you can only have 2 people attack you, your target and the person who’s target is you.

EDIT 2 - I think…

EDIT 3 - Yup confirmed.

Read full topic

item.title: Fishes
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

bootnecklad:

But bounty hunter? don’t they use food or is it fish loobys cook lobbys kill people eat lobbys fish + cook as needed?

I was under the impression that BH sucked and not as many people used it as they did use the wild [Though thats an impression, as I haven’t ever tried bounty hunter]
